question: 仏典
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Buddha</kanji> transcribed all of the <kanji>rule</kanji>s of Buddhism in the <vocabulary>Buddhist Scriptures</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>Buddhist Writing</vocabulary>s.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Note that <ja>ぶつ</ja> gets shortened to <ja>ぶっ</ja>.
